ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah caused you to grow from the earth
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God produced you from the earth like a vegetable growth;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And Allah has caused you to grow out of the earth so wondrously,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and the sun as a torch.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: ‘And it is Allah Who made you grow like vegetation from the earth.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Allah has brought you forth from the (dust of) earth
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Allah has made you grow out of the earth as a growth:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And God caused you to grow out of the earth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Allah hath caused you to grow as a growth from the earth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: how God has produced you from the earth and caused you to grow,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Allah hath caused you to grow from the earth as a growth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Allah made you grow from the earth, with a [vegetable] growth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And Allah has produced you from the earth growing (gradually),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Allah has brought you forth from the (dust of) earth. [Tafsir At-Tabari, Vol. 29, Page 97].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah has caused you to grow out of the earth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And God germinated you from the earth like plants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Allah has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [71:17] And God has caused you to grow, He has created you, from the earth, for He created your father Adam from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Allah hath caused you to grow as a growth from the earth) He created you from Adam, and Adam is created from dust and the dust is from the earth,
